website_summaries.verdict: Loved by celebrities, this moisturizer lives up to its expectations for normal skin types.
pros: The seaweed extract of this moisturizer is the ingredient that makes La Mer products so popular
Trademarked Miracle Brothformula energizes your skin to make it look youthful
Works for people who have eczema and rosacea – doesn’t irritate most skin

customer_reviews.title: Product knock off
customer_reviews.text: The product is a fake. Not real. Consistency and smell of common cold cream. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Lunavega

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Creme de la Mer for 20 years. This is not the real stuff. It is sticky and once applied it is tacky. The real la Mer is smooth and makes your skin glow. Buyer beware. I should have known!
customer_reviews.author: Suzane M. Diffine

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Facial Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for keeping the face moisturized and relaxing fine lines!! Highly reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Facial creme.
customer_reviews.text: Cream is somewhat dry and spread isn't smooth. Has a great reputation but I do not think it's worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Reeb

customer_reviews.title: Good but very expensive
customer_reviews.text: It was nice and you could tell the difference compared to other creams but the price it outrageous for such a small quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Redion Vathi

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer for average to very dry skin. Pricy but best product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Oil of O'le Lady
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Not too thick. Easy to apply. Absorbed quicky. Cons: Moisturized well but not much better than average moisturizer. Extremely pricey. I received a sample of this (about a weeks worth) from the manufacturer. It worked well but scent was terrible. It made me smell like an old lady...a rich old lady with poor financial decision making skills.
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Moisturizing Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of my favorite Moisturizing Cream, I can really feel the effect it has on my skin, making it look more fresh and soft. I use the cream daily and it only took a few days to really start to see a difference on my appearance, I think this must be one of the best I've ever used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Romolo Lerza

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Wow such a nice healthy feeling when I apply this under my eyes and you can actually feel it working. I put a tiny amount on at bedtime and wake up with soft skin in the mornings. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 47 years young and feel great, but one thing that's been showing my age the most is my skin. I bought this product based on the reviews and I'm glad I did! It's a fantastic moisturizer and works great. I can feel the difference after just a few applications. I can say that the price was worth every penny. I really need something that works well... it's the only skin I have. In my job, it's very important that I look as good as can be. I thought about giving this away as a Christmas present, but I'm going to keep it... lol
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the lookout for a great moisturizing cream for the winter. It seems that my skin gets dryer in the winter. No matter what kind of cream or lotion I use, it does not seem to work. My skin always feels dry, no matter what. I think I have found my solution for a perfect moisturizer for the winter in La Mer Creme De La Mer Moisturizing cream. It keeps my skin smooth and it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Z Ralte

customer_reviews.title: I had to get it
customer_reviews.text: I had to order this somewhere else because it was out of stock here, but I tried it out to help with the bags under my eyes because of my wifes snoring. I loved it, and had to get some of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Connell

customer_reviews.title: Really quality cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream works wonders! I have been using it for years and was paying top dollar. Finally found it for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Todor Boyadzhiev

product_meta.title: La Mer 2 Oz Creme De La Mer Moisturizing Cream
product_meta.description: Creme de la Mer Moisturizing Creme 2 oz - 60 ml
feature_bullets: Skin will benefit from this nourishing treatment.
This super rich cream transforms skin on contact and soothes.
This miracle cream has proven its success.
La Mer Creme de la Mer. 2 oz / 60 ml. For Women and Men.
